theChaser:Shadow Form.NAME: Shadow Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, increase #yTarget #yAttack damage by #b

theChaser:Target.NAME: Target
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever after player or monster attack, deal #b
damage to ALL enemies on #yTarget. NL

theChaser:Hide.NAME: Hide
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies stop action. Instantly end when attack. NL Last for #b

theChaser:Puzzled.NAME: Puzzled
DESCRIPTIONS: Apparently there was an enemy in front of me just before...

theChaser:Big Picture.NAME: Big Picture
DESCRIPTIONS: After you gain Debuff yourself, gain #b

theChaser:Saw Blade.NAME: Saw Blade
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, apply #b

theChaser:Diplade.NAME: Diplade
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card which cost is not 0, add #b

theChaser:Preemptive Attack.NAME: Preemptive Attack
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and Attack thechaser:Target once.

theChaser:Replica Dagger.NAME: Replica Dagger
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
#yThrowing #yKife into your hand. If there's no #yTarget, instead, apply #b
